nodes.text: Anti-glare goggles, also known as polarized goggles, were a make of tinted goggles that were specialized so that they could protect against the damaging rays of a strong sun. They were used by members of the Alliance to Restore the Republic while they were stationed in Echo Base on the planet Hoth. They were also worn by AT-ST drivers of the Galactic Empire. Imperials visiting or based on the planet Sirpar were also provided with polarized goggles. Zare Leonis, however, found that even with the goggles, shadows still seemed strangely shaped. Later, sweat slipped behind his polarized goggles and into his eyes.
